main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects occurred in Ocean Springs, Mississippi on July 8, 1962.
interesting points: Witnesses reported bright, circular and oval-shaped objects in the sky,Some sightings involved objects performing intricate maneuvers without any sound,The estimated sizes of the objects varied from 30 to 50 feet in diameter,Several reports noted that the objects accelerated rapidly and disappeared from view,Ground-based radar was unable to detect the objects.
witness description: Various local residents and a family including Mrs. Ethel Hobbs and others.
